entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING IN EFFECT, Cape Dorset
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:01 AM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Dorset Airport 3:00 PM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: N 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Freezing rain or snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 70%
entry.summary: Freezing rain ending this evening then cloudy with 70 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016
